name: Mashed Potatoes With Scallions
keywords: gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, potato, scallion, side dish
recipeIngredient: 5 Idaho or Washington potatoes, about 1 1/2 pounds
Freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the potatoes and cut them into 2-inch cubes. Place the cubes in a saucepan. Add water to cover and salt.

Bring to a boil and simmer 15 minutes, or until tender. Drain and put the potatoes through a food mill or mash them well with a potato masher. Add the butter and beat to blend. Stir in the milk, scallions, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Serve piping hot.
